actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-870.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S.  1965) to reauthorize and revise the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the conference report on S. 1965 (higher education programs) and against its consideration.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill (S.  1965) to reauthorize and revise the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes, and against the consideration of such conference report.
